sub_fields.label: Post type
sub_fields.name: post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Please select a post type you want to display.

sub_fields.label: Post limit
sub_fields.name: post_limit
sub_fields.instructions: Leave it blank if you want to show all posts

sub_fields.label: Inquiry Form
sub_fields.name: inquiry_form
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the Gravity Form for this page.

sub_fields.label: Map Code
sub_fields.name: map_code
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the map embed code into the text tab

sub_fields.label: Tab to be open
sub_fields.name: open_tab
sub_fields.instructions: If you would like a different tab than the first FAQ tab to be open on page load please enter the name of it below. You must match the name exactly.

sub_fields.label: Phone number
sub_fields.name: team_phone_number
sub_fields.instructions: If the team member has an extension in their phone number insert it here.

sub_fields.label: Linkedin
sub_fields.name: team_linkedin
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the team member's LinkedIn url

sub_fields.label: Symbol Placement
sub_fields.name: symbol_placement
sub_fields.instructions: Select if the symbol should go before the stat or after.

sub_fields.label: Incentive text
sub_fields.name: incentive_text
sub_fields.instructions: Optionally add text to provide incentive.

sub_fields.label: Perks
sub_fields.name: perks
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the perks associated with this price point

sub_fields.label: Register Link
sub_fields.name: register_link
sub_fields.instructions: Insert the registration link and the text for the link. Note, the link text will be the text displayed as the button text.

sub_fields.label: Maximum height
sub_fields.name: maximum_height
sub_fields.instructions: Set maximum height for image in px

fields.label: Small Hero
fields.name: small_hero
fields.instructions: Settings for the shorter heros that appear on pages other than the home page

sub_fields.label: Subheading Paragraph
sub_fields.name: subheading_paragraph
sub_fields.instructions: Enter any addition content you want bellow the heading

sub_fields.label: Alternative Page Title
sub_fields.name: alternative_page_title
sub_fields.instructions: If you want  a title in the hero that is different than the page name enter it here.

fields.label: Add Page Links?
fields.name: add_page_links
fields.instructions: Check to add inner pages submenu links.

fields.label: Add Grey Background To Page Links?
fields.name: add_grey_background_links
